content.rendered:
Dr. Gregory House’s grim appearance and grim style aren’t exactly reassuring at first glance. Moreover, the definite principle of an eccentric doctor is that the disease should be treated and not the patient, as patients were only “invented” to make the work of doctors more difficult. He is a self-contained, renitent figure, but undoubtedly a huge authority. His small team is made up of all the enthusiastic and promising young doctors he has selected himself – based on peculiar criteria, of course. For him, one thing is really important: to solve the case with a cold head, that is, to reveal the nature of the disease and gain evidence. And one more important piece of information about Doctor House: Try not to disturb him around one o’clock in the afternoon during your favorite hospital series!”
Seasons: 8 (2004-2012)
Status: Finished
Creator: David Shore
Channel: FOX
Starring: Hugh Laurie, Omar Epps, Robert Sean Leonard
